tool.name: CAT summarise

param.label: classification.official_names.txt
param.help: The classication must be made with only_official names

tool.help:
**CAT summarise**
Summarise taxonomic asignemts from anamed CAT or BAT classification file.
Required arguments: -i, --input_file Path to named CAT contig classification file or BAT bin classification file. Currently only official ranks are supported, and only classification files containing a single classification per contig / bin.
Optional arguments: -c, --contigs_fasta Path to contigs fasta file. This is required if you want to summarise a contig classification file.
@COMMON_HELP@
